description: Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) has a requirement for aerological observations at the Fort Nelson Upper Air Station, British Columbia
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Proposal
**Tender Reference:** cb-7554-86383983
**Tender Number:** 5000071302
**Closing Date:** September 4, 2023, at 18:00 EST

#### Project Overview
Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking proposals for aerological observations at the Fort Nelson Upper Air Station in British Columbia. This service is essential for ECCC's meteorological monitoring activities, and the contractor will be responsible for conducting two upper-air soundings daily, 365 days per year.

#### Services Required
- Preparation of instruments and deploying balloons with attached meteorological instruments
- Conducting upper-air soundings to collect meteorological data (temperature, humidity, wind speed, etc.)
- Monitoring and transmitting data in real-time to ensure timely receipt of information

#### Contract Period
- Expected contract start date: November 1, 2023
- Contract period: 3 years, with the possibility of 2 renewal option periods of 1 year each.

#### Technical Requirements
- Contractor must have expertise in meteorology and experience with upper-air observations
- Contractor must demonstrate the ability to deploy and deploy balloons with attached instruments
- Contractor must have infrastructure to handle and process large volumes of data

#### Evaluation Criteria
The contract will be awarded to the bidder who achieves the highest combined score on technical merit and price.

#### Languages of Communication
The tendering process will be conducted in both English and French.

#### Access to Solicitation Documents
- Tender notice and solicitation documents are available on the Government of Canada's bid-matching system "CanadaBuys"
- Documents are also available in PDF format: 
  * English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7554/5000071302-rfp-en_canadabuys.pdf
  * French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7554/5000071302-rfp-fr_canadabuys.pdf

#### Contact Information
For more information or clarification on the tender, please contact Angelina Garcia:
- Phone: (778) 726-1680
- Email: Angelina.Garcia@ec.gc.ca

#### Tender Expiry Date and Time
The tender will expire on September 4, 2023, at 18:00 EST.
